  passes in Economics/Commerce/Government, 
and any Science subject.  
r) OSUNPOLY requires ‘O’ level credit pass in one  
(1) Basic Science subject.  
s) FEDANIM-IBD requires ‘O’ level credit passes 
in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and 
any other two (2) from Economics, Geography, 
Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science.  
t) FECOFOR-JOS – Same as in Computer  
Science.  
u) MAPOLY accepts four (4) ‘O’ level credit passes 
at not more than two (2) sittings to include 
Mathematics with ‘O’ level pass in English 
language.  English Language is not counted as 
required credit pass.  
v) AKCAS requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, Physics/Chemistry and any other 
two (2) subjects from Biology/Agricultural 
Science, Further Mathematics, Statistics, 
Technical Drawing, Physics, Chemistry and ‘O’ 
level pass in English Language.  
w) SURE-POLY requires five (5) 'O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Physics and any other two (2) subjects at not 
more than two (2) sittings.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
a) FEDPO-ILA requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, a Basic Science subject and any 
one (1) of Economics/Commerce, Geography, 
Government/History, Physics, Chemistry, and 
Biology/Agricultural Science.  
b) FEDPO-NAM also accepts ‘O’ level credit passes 
in Physics and Chemistry.  
c) KAD-POLY accepts ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics and any two (2) of Social or 
Physical Sciences.  
d) FEDANIM-IBD requires ‘O’ level credit pass in 
Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, 
Physics, Economics and Chemistry.  
e) FECOFOR-JOS – Same as in Computer  
Science.  
 
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS
